text:
Two persons were killed in two different accidents here on Wednesday.

A retired Tangedco engineer died, after he was thrown off his two-wheeler when the front tyre burst. The victim, Saravanan (69) was returning from temple when the incident happened.

In another accident, a 44-year-old man died on the spot when the bike he was riding rammed a roadside tree. Chinathambi of Vellore was returning from Theerthamalai in Uthangarai to Vellore, with his friend on the pillion when the accident occurred. Chinathambi died on the spot and his friend was grievously injured.
title: Two killed in accidents
